Reviews.Title: Great realistic cameras at a great price
Reviews.Author: Christian B
Reviews.Content: I was a little skepticle buying this item with no other feedback, but im glad i did. These cameras are the most realistic "fake" dome cameras you can buy. They are weighted perfect after the two AA batteries were added. The LED light on the front is very bright and the mounting of the cameras was a breeze. You can ceiling mount like I did on my ceiling and also flat mount vertically like i did on my garage. Also the included stickers are great to put on the doors leading into the property. I would def. order these again, all my tennants think they are real, and since videosecu is a legit company with a website and real time recording info, noone has to know they are fake.

Reviews.Title: pretty cool but...
Reviews.Author: I love buying stuff
Reviews.Content: the led is too bright and flashes too often.better just leave it on without batteries. real cameras don't have flashing red lights.plus the led drains your batteries really fast. i used lithium ion batteries and they went out within 2 weeks. don't bother changing the batteries. it's a waste of time and is a dead give away that the cameras are fake.other than what i mentioned above, these are really great. i would not recommend it because only i want to have these.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality looking fake cam
Reviews.Author: Anne B
Reviews.Content: Only thing is I had to change to non blinking bulbs... looks more realistic ! Great buy for price! Would purchase these again add more in future

Reviews.Title: Great purchase. Recommended.
Reviews.Author: Humberto
Reviews.Content: I just received and installed my cameras. Very "real" indeed. I purchased them for my house because so the maid could feel somehow "checked". The ONLY problem I have is that the red LED light is way to bright. I was planning to place one camera inside my room and my baby's room and I didn't because of this. I do have some trouble trying to sleep with a red light flashing all over my room. What I did was place one camera inside my closet (where I keep valuable stuff) and the rest of them in different areas outside the rooms such as the living room and TV room. I consider this a great purchase and would definitely recommend these cameras.

Reviews.Title: Incredible product!
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: I've been around REAL security cameras/systems for quite some time now...These VideoSecu dummy security cameras are by far the most realistic dummy security cameras I've ever seen! The build quality and attention to detail is bar-none! Nice thick, heavy duty construction. Really feels solid.And in case you were wondering (as I didn't see a review regarding swiveling) the lense does have the ability to swivel full-motion. (up and down/side-to-side)I will not hesitate one second to purchase again!!!

Reviews.Title: Get these!
Reviews.Author: George Pill "Golden Rule"
Reviews.Content: Two security companies came to my house and proposed bullet cameras with 700 lines while the other suggested cameras that looked exactly like these dummies and had 720 lines. The second guy sez the bullet cams are easy to grab and break off or turn away. So I'm ordered 5 sets of these dome surveillance dummies. In the future, I could install real ones and mix and match cams to fool the thieves. I already have a loud burglar-fire alarm system so even if these smucks wear masks I've got that covered. Might help if you put up a plain computer-printed note on your front door saying "Burglar shot dead in this house 4-12-05". Sure keeps the pesky Mormons away.Oh BTW, the first quoter wanted $5500 for 8 bullet cams system with monitor. The second wanted $5800 for 8 dome cams without monitor. Think I'll stay with the dummies until I find a real reason to put real ones in.

Reviews.Title: Look so real!
Reviews.Author: Randolph4
Reviews.Content: A few months ago we had a rash of daytime breakins in our neighborhood.  So I ordered these to deter the thieves.  They really look like real cameras. They also came with recording stickers that I placed on each door. I use mine without the red light because my neighbor's real cameras do not have lights. Happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: The Hillbilly
Reviews.Author: The Hillbilly
Reviews.Content: These look good and work just as described but the batteries don't last very long so it gets expensive to keep them working. Otherwise they do the job they are suppose to.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The color and size  is perfect ...they just need to add 3M command strips to hang them up vs the screws the supply

Reviews.Title: strictly novelty
Reviews.Author: Curtis Worsham`
Reviews.Content: Strictly novelty and it shows. Batteries did not last a week. 2nd set of batteries only lasted 2 weeks. somewhat realistic

Reviews.Title: Very easy to install with template and all tested perfectly
Reviews.Author: CAT HERDER
Reviews.Content: Product arrived safe and sound via USPS. Very well packaged and units tested out perfectly! I am gaining more confidence with each order coming via the USPS after orders years ago that came damaged. After reading all of the reviews I have decided to not use the battery option at this time. However I had great success with a previous camera using NIMH batteries; which lasted about 6 months through the winter!

Reviews.Title: I got non videsecure dummy security camera that was generic and one was process labeled
Reviews.Author: Disappointed Customer
Reviews.Content: I got them and they were not VideoSecure labeled.  They were no name but one that was labeled Process. Not too happy not getting what i asked for.

Reviews.Title: Good for security
Reviews.Author: M. Grisham
Reviews.Content: They look real enough.  We had problems in the past with neighborhood kids vandalizing our cars out front of our house, these are a great deterrent from it happening again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome products
Reviews.Author: R. Cargile
Reviews.Content: Very realistic looking. Great buy for those that want to give the illusion of security. Movable with blinking LED, just get some rechargeables with them.

Reviews.Title: Ok product, not as professional looking as I was hoping them to be
Reviews.Author: Markham
Reviews.Content: Ok product, not as professional looking as I was hoping them to be. You can rotate the inter ball to the point you can see the back and tell that there is no wires runing to it. So if you were gonna use these, you need to make sure they are out of reach. I ended up returning them as they weren't what I was looking for. I felt that a person could look at one of these and feel like they were fake. They just didn't pass my eyeball test. Might work for someone who will mount them high and out of the way of close inspection.

Reviews.Title: Forget using the batteries to power the blinking LEDs; most REAL cameras don't have blinking LEDs anyway
Reviews.Author: Strategic Internet "www.strategic-internet.com"
Reviews.Content: One of the camera's had a loose battery compartment, but it still worked.  LED is not like any other LEDs I've ever experienced.  These cameras chew through two double AA batteries about every two - three weeks!  LEDs should use so little power that they should last 2 - 3 months.

Reviews.Title: Convincing enough to send solicitors packing
Reviews.Author: Bill Gottschalk
Reviews.Content: Battery life is an issue, but I've found that even without the blinking lights they are convincing enough.A recent encounter with a persistent, can't be bothered with the "No Soliciting" sign, door-to-door sales person proved the point. Once I pointed out the camera and my intent to call local codes enforcement stating "I have you on video and will file a complaint" elicited apologies for wasting my time and inconveniencing me.Neighbors likewise indicated that a prowler casing the neighborhood took one look at the array of these cameras, mounted strategically to (appear like they) cover egresses and blind corners, then moved on. Later in the day the same individual was arrested while attempting to break into a house a block away.

Reviews.Title: Marginal product.
Reviews.Author: William K. Gaylord
Reviews.Content: This was a disappointment to me. I should have heeded the other ratings more. The batteries don's last long, maybe a week or slightly longer.  The mounting screws provided have small heads which do not grab the groove edges so they don't really hold anything. I had to get into my screw supply to solve this one. I put one of the four up and the rest are still in the box.  It could fool somebody, I guess, but I am not impressed.

Reviews.Title: Am dissapointed
Reviews.Author: PushEE Posh
Reviews.Content: When this dummy security camera arrived, the glass inside was loose...all four. I travelled a few days later and for that reason, I couldn't return them and have had to dump them!I am highly dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: good  value, will  buy  again  when  on  sale.
Reviews.Author: bertrand Bogaert
Reviews.Content: Looks  very  much  like  the  real  thing. Just  wish  they  came  with  a discreet  switch, in  order  to  turn  to led  ligth  of  when  at  home.I  have  installed  them  with  a  switch  at  my  home.

Reviews.Title: Battery Life Short
Reviews.Author: LMM
Reviews.Content: I brought a dome security camera that takes 2 double AA batteries and another camera that takes 3 Double AA batteries still working over 3 months with alkaline throw away batteries..Unfortunately VideoSecu 4 Dummy Security Cameras battery life is very short with 2 brand new Kirkland alkaline batteries cannot even last 3 weeks.  Faulty design blinks to fast and very bright.  Ordered 2500 mAh lithium rechargeable batteries (eneloop) will see if I get the 5 or 6X better longevity of battery life.Product shipped on time, easy to mount, looks really authentic but changing batteries every 3 weeks is not a desirable.

Reviews.Title: Realistic looking, but eats batteries
Reviews.Author: John Fix
Reviews.Content: We have a 16 camera system in our store already and ordered this 4 pack to supplement the system and discourage shoplifters. The dummy cameras look very good, especially when the LED is flashing.  However, you need to replace the batteries every two weeks which is a bit of a pain.  So expect that they will not be flashing much of the time unless you remember to replace the batteries regularly.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecur Simulated Cameras
Reviews.Author: Pita
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with appearance and easy installation.  Battery life very short, however - only 2-1/2 weeks.  Will spend the extra money and try lithium batteries.  If those are short-lived, as well, I will forgo flashing LED.  The criminals will notice, I fear.  We have a lot of crime around the house.

Reviews.Title: FAKING OUT THE BAD GUYS
Reviews.Author: Joe V Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I find these dummy security cameras a welcomed additional to the alarm security system that I already have.  I use the red light that flashes on  and off and I like it.  I believe that people see blinking and they keep on moving down to the next house.  I also put some warning stickers on each of my windows letting the outside world know they are being watched.  What they don't know can't hurt.  Installing the cameras was easy too.

Reviews.Title: cheap and small
Reviews.Author: steve pitman
Reviews.Content: fake cameras are very small and very cheap looking,i doubt they will fool even the dumbest of criminals,and blinking lights eat up the battery within 2 weeks,i don not recommend

Reviews.Title: They must make a lot of money on these
Reviews.Author: Charles C. Serrie
Reviews.Content: Like other reviews these don't look real but when mounted they appear real from a distance. Didn't install the batteries as the real cameras don't have a flashing light. The stickers are quite small rendering them useless to all but those within 3 feet. In the end I rated them ok as they serve the purpose of making our home in concert with a real camera and security system appear secured.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 4 Dummy Fake Surveillance Cameras
Reviews.Author: K. Weaver
Reviews.Content: I received my cameras on time as promised with excellent packaging for shipping. Cameras are very realistic and the flashing light that simulates night vision can be seen very well from a distance.  Would definitely recommend to someone that wants to have an alternative to more expensive live video cameras.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in blinking light and 20 pcs fake IR LEDs
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Can be mounted on wall or ceiling using the included screws
Dummy simulated dome security camera increases your security at a fraction of the cost of real camera, deters possible thieves and intruders
Package included: 4 x fake cameras and 4 x free security warning stickers. Power requires: 2 x AA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Dummy Security Cameras Fake Dome Surveillance Cameras Simulated Infrared LEDs with Flashing Light C4B
